company: BuySure Trust & Insurance Services GB Ltd
description: Built tools that actually made brokers' lives easier, cutting their prep time by over 60%.
detailedDescription: I spent the summer working with insurance brokers who were drowning in manual processes. They needed something that would save them time without adding complexity. So I built a dashboard that pulled together everything they needed—Bank of England rates, mortgage feeds, currency widgets—all in one place. The best part was seeing them actually use it and hearing that their quote preparation went from hours to minutes.
responsibilities: Created a Financial Rates dashboard in React that brought together scattered data sources into something brokers could actually use daily
Fixed the company website's mobile experience and made it properly accessible—turned out they had international clients who really needed this
Prototyped an automation tool that saved the team from copying data around manually; 15 brokers now use it regularly
achievements: Made the site WCAG AA compliant
Built something people actually wanted to use

description: Kept 50+ small businesses running smoothly through remote support and troubleshooting.
detailedDescription: Small businesses don't have IT departments, so when something breaks, they're stuck. I worked remotely supporting over 50 clients—fixing everything from network issues to software problems. You learn to explain technical things clearly when you're helping someone who just needs their printer working before a deadline.
responsibilities: Provided remote IT support to 50+ small business clients across various industries
Diagnosed and resolved hardware, software, and network issues quickly to minimize downtime
Communicated technical solutions in plain English to non-technical business owners

description: Building websites for clients who want something modern and accessible, not just functional.
detailedDescription: I work with clients who know what they want but need someone to actually build it. Usually it's about creating something clean that works everywhere—phone, tablet, desktop. I've also helped a few migrate from dodgy hosting to something more secure, which honestly should've been done years ago.
responsibilities: Build custom websites in React focused on performance and accessibility
Handle migrations to secure hosting with proper SSL certificates and SSH access
Work directly with clients to understand what they actually need, not just what they think they want

description: Grew a tech channel to over half a million views by making content people actually find useful.
detailedDescription: Started AlludeTech because I enjoyed solving tech problems and figured others might find it helpful too. Turns out they did—520,000+ views later, I'm working with tech companies on sponsored content and trying to maintain a 17.8% click-through rate, which apparently is quite good. It's taught me as much about storytelling and audience engagement as it has about the tech itself.
responsibilities: Create tech reviews and tutorials that people watch all the way through (17.8% CTR, 3x the average)
Negotiate sponsorships with tech companies while keeping content genuine
Script, film, and edit everything myself—you learn quickly when there's no one else to blame
achievements: Secured paid partnerships with tech brands

description: Customer Advisor retail work, primarily in the perfume section, upselling fragrances based on customer requirements... turns out customer service skills transfer everywhere.
detailedDescription: Been working weekends at Boots in the perfume section whilst studying, recently being given the exclusive role of being a 'Fragrance Ambassador'. It's not tech at all, but you'd be surprised how much of software development is about understanding what people actually want versus what they say they want. That, and staying patient when things get busy.
responsibilities: Help customers find products and make purchase decisions
Handle transactions and maintain stock levels
Deal with weekend rush crowds whilst staying helpful
